data.title: which saiyuki is better
data.text:
Quote by cifirynMy vote goes definitely to the first part -Gensomaden Saiyuki!

May be the animation was no as good as in Reload or Gunlock... but still, I liked that part of the story a LOT. The single episodes were more "interesting" (or "touching") also...

The music -openings, endings, OST's, and other songs- was much better in GS IMO.

Of course I like all the other Saiyuki's as well, is just that if I had to pick one, I would definitely go with GS :)
